ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), OR($Profile.Name = "2008-09 HRS 4S Operations",$Profile.Name = "2008-09 HRS 4S Operations B",$Profile.Name ="2008-09 HRS 4S Service Manager"),
IF(RecordType.Name = "HRS 4S Manual Trade",
IF( Number_of_Employees__c >1, ISBLANK(Notes_for_CAM__c) ,false),False))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the remaining employee information in the Notes for CAM field
